title: American Meat Culture, Occupation NOT A Good Strategy? 8.17.21
itunes:title: American Meat Culture, Occupation NOT A Good Strategy? 8.17.21
description:
In episode 970 Jack and Miles are joined by host of the TV, I Say podcast Ashley Rae to discuss the Texas counties ignoring Gov Abbot, embracing fake meat, James O’Keefe, Afghanistan, Taco Bell and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. TDZ LIVE SHOW TICKETS!
  2. Texas Supreme Court sides with Gov Abbot, counties ignore them
  3. How to embrace fake meat...
  4. Horrifying Scenes In Afghanistan
  5. Taco Bell Joins The Dystopian Drive-Thru Trend
  6. LISTEN: BADBADNOTGOOD - Goodbye Blue

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
